results.title: Next Sanity
results.description: Sanity toolkit for Next.js

results.title: Next.js Starter Template
results.description: A production-ready Next.js starter template with modern tooling, featuring Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS 4, shadcn/ui, NextAuth.js, Drizzle ORM, Stripe integration, and comprehensive testing.

results.title: Next.js Starter
results.description: A Next.js 15 starter template with React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/ui, Stripe, Next-auth, Drizzle ORM, and Jest for a robust and modern web application.

results.title: Next.js
results.description: Next.js enables you to create full-stack web applications by extending the latest React features and integrating powerful Rust-based JavaScript tooling for the fastest builds.

results.title: Tiptap Editor in Nextjs
results.description: A modern, feature-rich Rich Text Editor template built with Next.js 14 and TipTap, offering rich text and HTML modes, light/dark themes, responsive design, and SSR/CSR content rendering.

results.title: Next.js Boilerplate
results.description: A boilerplate and starter for Next.js 15+ with App Router, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript, prioritizing developer experience with tools like ESLint, Prettier, Vitest, and Clerk authentication.

results.title: LangChain Next.js Template
results.description: LangChain + Next.js starter template

results.title: Next Maps
results.description: A lightweight, interactive, and customizable map built with Next.js App Router, styled with Tailwind CSS, and powered by Mapbox GL JS.

results.title: Next MDX Remote
results.description: A set of utilities for loading MDX within Next.js getStaticProps or getServerSideProps and hydrating it correctly on the client.

results.title: Next.js Drag-and-Drop Dashboard Demo
results.description: A beautiful and performant dashboard demo built with Next.js, shadcn/ui, and swapy, featuring drag-and-drop layout customization, real-time updates, responsive design, and server-side rendering.

results.title: Next.js
results.description: This repository provides starter templates and final code for Learn Next.js courses, covering App Router, data fetching, databases, auth, basics, TypeScript, and SEO.

results.title: Next On Pages
results.description: A CLI tool to build, develop, and deploy Next.js applications for the Cloudflare Pages platform, enhancing the developer experience with an ESLint plugin and development submodule.

results.title: ImageKit Next.js SDK
results.description: The ImageKit Next.js SDK simplifies integrating ImageKit.io into Next.js applications, enabling automatic image optimization, responsive rendering, and AI-powered transformations.

results.title: Mini-App Next.js Template
results.description: A Next.js template for building LUKSO mini-apps, demonstrating UP-Provider integration, Envio-based profile search, and using `@lukso/web-components` and `erc725js` for Universal Profile interaction.

results.title: Next Translate
results.description: Next-translate is an easy i18n solution for Next.js, offering automatic page optimization, React 18 support, and efficient translation loading with minimal dependencies.

results.title: Next.js
results.description: Next.js is a React framework for building full-stack web applications, featuring file-system routing, API routes, and optimized rendering with the App Router.

results.title: Next.js
results.description: Next.js is a React framework for building full-stack web applications, offering features like server-side rendering, static site generation, and API routes.

results.title: Next Drupal
results.description: Next-generation front-end for your Drupal site, enabling seamless integration with Next.js for enhanced performance and user experience.

results.title: Next Cloudinary
results.description: High-performance image delivery and uploading at scale in Next.js powered by Cloudinary, offering features like automatic optimization, AI cropping, and dynamic social media card generation.

results.title: Next.js
results.description: Next.js is a React framework for building full-stack web applications. It provides additional features and optimizations, automatically configuring lower-level tools to help developers focus on building products quickly.

results.title: Next.js FastAPI Template
results.description: A Next.js and FastAPI template providing a solid foundation for scalable, high-performance web applications with end-to-end type safety using TypeScript and Zod validation.

results.title: Next Whois UI
results.description: ЁЯзк Your Next-Gen Whois Lookup Tool With Modern UI. Support Domain/IPv4/IPv6/ASN/CIDR Whois Lookup And Powerful Features.

results.title: Telegram Mini Apps Next.js Template
results.description: Telegram Mini Apps application template using Nex.jst, TypeScript, TON Connect and tma.js.

results.title: AuthKit Next.js
results.description: AuthKit Next.js provides helpers for authentication and session management with WorkOS & AuthKit in Next.js applications, specifically for the App Router.

results.title: Next SEO
results.description: Next SEO is a plugin that simplifies managing SEO in Next.js projects, offering features for meta tags, Open Graph, and JSON-LD.

results.title: Next.js FastAPI Template
results.description: A template for scalable, high-performance web applications, integrating FastAPI and Next.js with TypeScript and Zod for end-to-end type safety, schema validation, and quick deployment.

results.title: Next Video
results.description: Next Video is a React component for Next.js applications that provides automatic video optimization, smart storage, customizable UI, and built-in analytics for enhanced video playback.

results.title: Next.js Supabase Stripe Starter
results.description: Bootstrap your SaaS with a modern tech stack including Next.js, Supabase, Stripe, React Email, and Tailwind CSS, featuring webhooks for Stripe-Supabase synchronization and prebuilt pages.

results.title: Django-Next.js
results.description: Seamlessly integrates Django and Next.js pages, allowing Django to proxy requests to Next.js for a unified development and production experience.
